thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Using history to fake quality
thread.title_full: Using history to fake quality - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: acaymangirl66
title: Using history to fake quality
text:
Don't let the years of being in business fool you.
I don't think they cleaned the place since they remodeled it in 96'. The breakfast buffet is literally a joke $35 per day to have a mini fridge what no coffee pot in room I would rather stay at the budget hotel next time, rather than a business pretend to be elegant and get budget service.... absolute joke. Roosevelt hotel owned by Pakistan Airlines NICE
